text.$invariant:
It's essential to choose the right sliding gate opener for your needs. Size of the gate, frequency of use and exposure to the elements all play a part. That’s where we come in. Automating your sliding gate is quick and easy with Automatic Technology. Our products are simple to install and will reliably stand the test of time.

What sets Automatic Technology sliding gate openers apart?

contentData.description: A powerful drive unit that reliably moves gates up to 800kg. Clever features like the soft Stop and Start functionality reduce strain on the motor and ensure that the opener will stand the test of time.
contentData.heading: Powerful technology

contentData.description: Automatic obstruction detection ensures that if the gate comes into contact with an object the opener will stop and reverse, avoiding potentially expensive or dangerous property damage.
contentData.heading: Automatic smarts

contentData.description: Automatic service indicators that let you know when your gate is due for a service.
contentData.heading: In-built service reminders

contentData.description: Secure remotes that use the latest TrioCode128 encryption technology and multi-frequency hopping to avoid radio interference.
contentData.heading: Innovative technology

contentData.description: Keyed emergency release mechanisms that make it easy to open and close the gate in the event of power failure.
contentData.heading: Emergency release mechanism

contentData.description: Weather resistant exteriors for installations where the opener is exposed to the elements to prevent water damage.
contentData.heading: Weather resistant
